snippet: Two popular convenience stores in the Northeast, Wawa and Sheetz, have loyal followings that hew closely to their geographic range. At left, locations for both chain stores in the region.
lead_paragraph: Two popular convenience stores in the Northeast, Wawa and Sheetz, have loyal followings that hew closely to their geographic range. At left, locations for both chain stores in the region.

headline.main: Wawa or Sheetz? A Matter of Convenience
